attributes.additional_details:
A lot of us with families living abroad look forward to December to spend Christmas / New Year's Eve with our loved ones. For some of us, December is the only time in the year we get to see and celebrate with our family members.

Due to Second Lockdown and restrictions in travel, December 2020 is looking less cheerful if you forbid us to travel for Christmas. As there is a lot of uncertainty regarding the end of the second lockdown, please allow at least international travel to see our family members.

Helps us make December 2020 a little better by not forcing us to cancel our holidays during Christmas Season.

Thank you
attributes.background: Allow people to travel internationally for the holidays in December 2020.

rejection.details: The Government have announced that the current Covid restrictions will end on 2 December, including the ban on international travel.
